gallamayata dan theruna eya ethana bayit una kiyala.ee madiwata mage hinawa nawathinneth na ayiya ikmanata ithuru salli dunneth na mata ethanin yanna.man hina wenawa ee gallamaya lajjawata mata rawanawa.ithuru salli hambuna gaman man tak gala ethanin aawa moko ethana thawa tikak wela hitiya nam ee lamaya iringu karalakin mata gahanawa.ee gollonta iringu dila salli dila ithuru hambenakanma ara gallamaya ape wan eka diha bala bala mata rawa rawa hitiya.

methek kal jathiye bharakaruwa sambandhayen ella wu chodanawa wuye ohu eekadhipathi swarupayen hasirena bawaya.wyawastha sanshodhanaya wisin methek kal thathwakara washayen thibu eekadhipathithwaya wyawasthapitha muladharmayak lesa nithigatha karanu atha.methanin ikbithi eekadhipathithwaya yanu rate nithiyayi.eya rate mulika nithiya wisin piligath wyawasthamaya sanrachakayaki.eekadhipathi hasirimak palakaya thula pawathima ekaki.eya rate nithiya lesa wyawasthapitha kirima eeta wada bhayanaka thawekaki.kawurun piliganimata kamathi wuwath nathath methanin ikbithi apa jiwathwannata yanne eekadhipathiwadaya nithiya bawata pathwu deshayakaya.wipakshaya danatamath sithala wuth namika wuth prapanchayak bawata path keri atha.sathi kihipayakata pera wikashaya wu deshapalana wadasatahanakadi thama 17 wanasanshodhanaya pilibada aba mal ronaka deyak nodanna bawa piligath upeksha swarnamali 18 wana sanshodhanaya dinawima wenuwen janadhipathige datha shakthimath kirimata thindu kota thibe.widhayaka janadhipathi dhuraye athimahath balaya idiriye sammatha ramuwa thula kriya karana nila wipakshaya thawaduratath naya yame,diya wi yame kriyawaliya idiriyatada nonawathinu athi athara rajya saha pudgalika janamadhya siyalla dadi lesa janadhipathidhuraye balaya wisin hila kota thibena sandarbhayaka eekadhipathi samajayak yanu nowalakwiya haki sathyayak wima aniwaryaya.
